answers.answer: Oh i pray that you dont have it....but i woukd advise that u both get tested again for the sake of the baby and your own piece of mind. Ive read that sometimes HIV screening doesnt always give u accurate results it can even take years so keep checking yourself if you know ur in danger of it. Also ur body can make u believe wot ur mind is terrified of. Please get tested and update us! I pray that ur clear IJN. Xx
im crying… thank you…. i will…

The mind is a very powerful thing, it can play with your fears and make them seem realistic. If you really believe that you're sick and start looking for symptoms then you well find them. Try to relax all this stress isn't good for you or your baby. Request a second test for both you and your partner. I hope all works out well.
we did last month and it still came back negative. thats why I'm scared. :( thank you I'm gonna try and see if they test me again before the baby gets here.
you should try getting tested for diabetes, numbness is a sign..

I'd safely say you are negative if you have both been tested and have not slept with anyone else since. I think your mind is running wild on you and you are imagining symptoms as if you were positive. To put your kind at ease have another blood test done and them maybe you can relax and enjoy your pregnancy.
Thats not HIV. I agree with the diabetes test. Several symptoms there.

i googled it and it just seems i have symptoms of it and he does too thats why i am worried we keep getting false negatives. but every time we do blood test it keeps coming back negative. i always had regular periods before i got pregnant they never changed. his never gotten this bad till just this month. i was dizzy a couple of months ago but thats when i found out i was pregnant. i hear you sweat more when you have hiv. we want to do another blood test but my doctor said i had tow air and doesn't see why i should have another one. but its just scaring me guys idk than you

I don't think it sounds like HIV either. Not that I know too much about it. But I don't think HIV is that common and your symptoms and his sound like various things. He could have the flu. Or pneumonia. I think HIV makes you lose weight and get very thin because your body starts shutting down and you said he's gaining weight. And you're not losing it either. Gaining weight, dizzy and tingly hands could be type 2 diabetes. And yor symptoms sound like they could just be from pregnancy and your toe nails could just be a fungus of some sort. Alot of people get weird symptoms during pregnancy for instance my mom told me she got warts on her hands meanwhile she had never had a wart in her life. I'm not a doctor but I wouldn't freak out too much!

its only on my left foot. that i got it. my other foot is really normal. and it also said hiv causes yeast infection i had a yeast infection. well i had 2. one before i got pregnant. and one when i found out i was pregnant. they said when you have hiv you got yeast infections.
Do u or boyfriend think that u have been exposed to it from one of ur past partners.Is that why u think u have it
When you get yeast infection it doesn't mean you have HIV. Some woman actually get yeast infection when one you vjj don't get enough air two you don't really clean yourself good three bubble bath.
no he doesn't think we do but i do because he was telling me symptoms and i was googling them. i hear you can get it easy when you had chalmydia which we both had
I think ur looking for something u don't have. U need to relax and believe ur test results

I can guarantee you could look up several illnesses and it would have those symptoms. Every time I look up symptoms I have it always comes back with some possibly fatal disease. The internet is your worst enemy when your sick. Trust your dr. It is highly unlikely that both of you would have hiv after being tested several times with different intervals in between.

question: i posted this in HIV forum but no replays and I'm scaring myself. i found i was pregnant last year. they did find chalymida and took test to see if i had hiv or aids and it came back negative. they also did one for my babys father and his came back neg so we both got treatment for chalymdia. i have always got tested for hiv and stuff for 3 years and it always comes back negative.but lately my babys father got a cold. and he hasn't got better. he says his fatigued and dizzy and his back hurts. he has gained weight a lot of it. he doesn't lose it. we thought he was getting my pregnancy symptoms but now I'm scared he has hiv. he says sometimes his hands get tingly as we'llas for me i am really sweaty when i sleep. i don't gain weight but i don't loose it. my hands started to get tingly my body achs to but i thought it was because I'm further along in my pregnancy. not my whole body just my back is that achs. my left foot toe nails did get weird and thicker looking and itch all the time. i had blisters between my fingers 2 years ago but doctor told me i had scabies from when i lived ith my cousin and when i put on the medication the itching and blisters between the fingers went awayis there any chance we both got false negatives?  we haven't slept with separate people in 2 years. please someone help. have we been getting false negatives.
title: im scared and need help
